Sarah worked at Northern Arizona University after you started
While I was waiting for my INTERVIEW in a reception area, a pizza delivery man, a young guy, dressed in a T-shirt and jeans carried a heavy pack of pizza boxes and water bottles.
He struggled with the door, I jumped up, but before I could help him, a receptionist let him through.
5 mins later I am sitting in the interview conference room, the pizza delivery man walks in.
He extends his hand for a handshake and says
"I am Greg Tagaris, Chief Information Officer of DoubleClick. Sorry I am a little late, I was taking food to my guys. They are working without lunch because we have technical problems.
I saw you trying to help me, thanks".
He offered me a job right at the end of the interview, and I accepted, without negotiation.
You can tell a good boss very quickly by how they treat other people. Greg was one of many good bosses I had a good fortune to work for.

We are a Movement of change - for our industry, clients, partners and communities! The reason behind why we do what we do is simple: we exist to love and value people.Since our founding in 2008, Movement has grown from 4 employees to almost 4000, and is now one of the top purchase mortgage banks in the country. We have done this with an unwavering commitment to excellence achieved through upfront underwriting, innovative 7 Day Processing, and by treating each transaction with dedication and focus. Want to hear more about how you can join the movement? Let's talk today!

Sarah's humble efforts with the Rescue Paws organization did not go unnoticed. Her strength, determination, and heart made the world of difference to the team in which she supported and the animals to which she gave so much love. Working with Sarah at XploreAsia/Rescue Paws was beyond a pleasure! Her creative spirit and resourcefulness inspired coworkers and made a huge impact on the organization - driving engagement with innovative marketing efforts, creative work on social through gorgeous and compelling photos that drove higher animal adoption, to filming and developing videos for Rescue Paws that really amplified the organization as a whole. Her contagious spirit will better any organization - you would be lucky to have her.

High Performing Sales Manager  and Sales Developer.
July 18, 2017, Dior was senior to Sarah but didn’t manage directly

I had the pleasure of working with Dior for over a year at Groupon. During this time, Dior was a Divisional Sales Manager and led various teams on the floor. I was particularly impressed with Dior's ability to connect with each of his  sales team members, develop their skills and define their professional goals. He was always willing to put in the extra time to help anyone who needed it, including members who did not report to him directly.  This ultimately led directly to his overall success and in large, growth in our office.Additionally, Dior contributed to the culture and liveliness of the office, always with a great attitude and encouraging commentary. Any employee would be lucky to have him as a manager.
